item.description:
PAWS Fundraising event at Subaru is 10:00 - 2:00 pm and the annual Wakefield Holiday Stroll is 3:00 - 7:00 pm.  Read on...

SATURDAY, DECEMBER 3, 2011

10:00 AM - 2:00 PM

SUBARU OF WAKEFIELD

 888 MAIN STREET

 PAWS joins the ASPCA® and Subaru of America for our annual year-end "Share the Love" campaign and celebration.

Featured Activities and Special Guests

Holiday Gifts and Raffle Gift Baskets: Stop by our sale table for specially priced gifts and pet items.  The selection is varied and the prices are fantastic!  You may be able to fill Fifi's and Fido's stockings just from our table, and find a little something for yourself, too!

We are also raffling about a dozen gift baskets from local merchants and supporters.  Buy as many raffle tickets as you want to increase your chances of getting that truly special gift.  If you would like to purchase your raffle tickets in advance, please call us at 781-246-6111. 

Free Gifts For Your Pet:  Everyone loves a gift and everyone loves a freebie, no matter the species.  Be sure to be one of the first 200 guests, and pick up a goodie bag for your dog or your cat.

Information Station: Stop by our Information Station to pick up tips on pet care and brochures and information from pet-service providers in our area.  

Microchipping and Nail Trims:  VCA Wakefield Animal Hospital staff will be available to microchip your pets and/or trim their nails.  Microchips are only $20 and Nail Trims $7.  All proceeds will benefit our PAWS pets.

Pictures with Santa: North pole cuties, Santa and his Elf, will available for your holiday photo opportunities.  Photographer, Tom Luongo, will be donating his skills to provide a 4x6 holiday memory for you an your pets.  Only $10 for a photo and holiday frame card.

Ask the Vet:  Dr. Beth Innis of Sleepy Dog Acupuncture and Holistic Home Care will be available to answers your questions about pet health, alternative medicine, acupuncture, and more.

  AdopTees:  Owner of Adoptees, Elaine Sanfilippo, will be available to help you find that perfect holiday gift.  50% of net proceeds go to support local animal shelters. 

 Boston Sports Club: Stop by BSC's table for information about burning off those holiday treats ... and pick up your free 1-week member pass!

 Oldies 103.3:  The day will be filled with holiday cheer, music and special give-aways from Oldies 103.3 from 10:00 a.m. to noon. 

THEN... from 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm the businesses of downtown Wakefield are having their Annual Holiday Stroll!  Main St. and Albion St. will be shut down so people can enjoy visiting the various shops and street vendors all lit up and offering treats and giveaways!  I won't be able to make it this year but please do stop by my office at 29 Albion St. (Century 21 Real Estate) as we go all out with delicious goodies for visitors!

Here is an article on all of the planned entertainment, etc. http://wakefield.patch.com/events/holiday-stroll-and-other-xmas-events-coming-to-town
item.name: 12/3 is a fun, busy day in Wakefield! Two big events....Holiday Stroll and more
